nodes.bodyText: The default timeout for waitForFunction is 10 seconds. It is too short and made tests flaky. Increase it to 30 seconds helps to reduce flaky.
If you think individual steps are too slow, please file tickets on those, especially if it's a regression.
throw (err) to keep original stacktrace unchanged. It was a mistake to do throw new Error() before.
you might be able to set the stack trace to the original stack trace if you need to.
Could you also use await here?
return makes await redundant. same outcome with or without it.
